__e: Winds of fate took it all - our dreams never came true.
Winds of fate took my love - and she'll never return.
We got winds coming in from the North.
We underwent winds of 80 to 100 Km / h all day and we hurt to recover the tent.

(Verily, in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and in the alternation of night and day, and the ships which sail through the sea with that which is of use to mankind, and the water (rain) which Allah sends down from the sky and makes the earth alive therewith after its death, and the moving (living) creatures of all kinds that He has scattered therein, and in the veering of winds and clouds which are held between the sky and the earth, are indeed Ayat (proofs, evidences, signs, etc.) for people of understanding.) (2:164)
First this little planet and its winds and ways, and then all the laws of mind and matter that restrain him.

Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and earth, and the alternation of the night and the day, and the [great] ships which sail through the sea with that which benefits people, and what Allah has sent down from the heavens of rain, giving life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and dispersing therein every [kind of] moving creature, and [His] directing of the winds and the clouds controlled between the heaven and the earth are signs for a people who use reason (2:164)
In order for the winds to blow, I must sacrifice my child.
In stormy weather when tempests rage. And winds do howl. Rest,
It gives me wonder, great as my content, to see you here before me.
Strong winds are often blowing around here.
